languages.text: {n}Калькасар, лихорадочно дергающий рычаги на операционном алтаре Ярма, рычит:{/n} "План был другой, {name}! Остановись!" {n}Инквизитор пытается потянуться к оружию, но управление сложной машиной не дает его рукам ни одного свободного мгновения.{/n} "Этому не бывать!"

{n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's control altar,{/n} "This was not the plan, {name}! Stop!" {n}He tries to reach for his weapon, but his hands are full operating the intricate machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "This cannot happen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Калькасар, лихорадочно дергающий рычаги на операционном алтаре Ярма, рычит:{/n} "План был другой, {name}! Остановись!" {n}Инквизитор пытается потянуться к оружию, но управление сложной машиной не дает его рукам ни одного свободного мгновения.{/n} "Этому не бывать!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's operational altar:{/n} "Our plan was different, {name}! Stop!" {n}The Inquisitor tries to reach for his weapons, but his hands are full with the complicated controls of the machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "That will not happen!"

{n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's operational altar:{/n} "Our plan was different, {name}! Stop!" {n}The Inquisitor tries to reach for his weapons, but his hands are full with the complicated controls of the machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "That will not happen!"

{n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's operational altar:{/n} "Our plan was different, {name}! Stop!" {n}The Inquisitor tries to reach for his weapons, but his hands are full with the complicated controls of the machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "That will not happen!"

{n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's operational altar:{/n} "Our plan was different, {name}! Stop!" {n}The Inquisitor tries to reach for his weapons, but his hands are full with the complicated controls of the machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "That will not happen!"

{n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's control altar,{/n} "This was not the plan, {name}! Stop!" {n}He tries to reach for his weapon, but his hands are full operating the intricate machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "This cannot happen!"

{n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's control altar,{/n} "This was not the plan, {name}! Stop!" {n}He tries to reach for his weapon, but his hands are full operating the intricate machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "This cannot happen!"

languages.text: {n}Calcazar rugit en tirant frénétiquement sur les leviers de l'autel de contrôle du Joug :{/n} « Ce n'est pas ce que nous avions prévu, {name} ! Arrêtez ! » {n}Il tente de se saisir de son arme, mais il a les mains prises par les commandes complexes de la machine, ce qui ne lui en laisse pas l'occasion.{/n} « Non ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's control altar,{/n} "This was not the plan, {name}! Stop!" {n}He tries to reach for his weapon, but his hands are full operating the intricate machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "This cannot happen!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar rugit en tirant frénétiquement sur les leviers de l'autel opérationnel du Joug :{/n} « Ce n'était pas notre plan, {name} ! Arrêtez ! » {n}L'inquisiteur tente de se saisir de ses armes, mais il a les mains prises par les commandes complexes de la machine, ce qui ne lui en laisse pas l'occasion.{/n} « N'y comptez pas ! »

languages.text: {n}Calcazar ruge mientras tira de las palancas del altar operativo del Yugo en un frenesí:{/n} «¡Este no era el plan, {name}! ¡Deténgase!». {n}El Inquisidor intenta llevar la mano a su arma, pero tiene las manos ocupadas con los complejos controles de la máquina y no puede dejarlos ni por un segundo.{/n} «¡No lo permitiré!».
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's control altar,{/n} "This was not the plan, {name}! Stop!" {n}He tries to reach for his weapon, but his hands are full operating the intricate machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "This cannot happen!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar ruge mientras tira de las palancas del altar operativo del Yugo en un frenesí:{/n} «¡Este no era el plan, {name}! ¡Deténgase!». {n}El Inquisidor intenta llevar la mano a su arma, pero no puede apartarlas de los complejos controles de la máquina ni por un segundo.{/n} «¡No lo permitiré!».

languages.text: {n}卡尔卡扎高声咆哮着，疯狂地拉着圣枷操作台上的拉杆。{/n}“这和我们的计划不一样，{name}！住手！”{n}卡尔卡扎试图去拿他的武器，但他两只手都忙于控制复杂的机器，根本腾不出手。{/n}“我绝不允许这种事情！”
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's control altar,{/n} "This was not the plan, {name}! Stop!" {n}He tries to reach for his weapon, but his hands are full operating the intricate machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "This cannot happen!"

traits.locale_text: {n}卡尔卡扎高声咆哮着，疯狂地拉着圣枷操作台上的拉杆。{/n}“这和我们的计划不一样，{name}！住手！”{n}卡尔卡扎试图去拿他的武器，但他两只手都忙于控制复杂的机器，根本腾不出手。{/n}“我绝不允许这种事情！”

languages.text: {n}Calcazar brüllt auf, versucht panisch an den Hebeln auf dem Betriebsaltar des Jochs zu ziehen:{/n} "So war das nicht geplant, {name}! Halt!" {n}Er versucht, nach seiner Waffe zu greifen, doch seine Hände sind mit der Bedienung der komplizierten Maschine beschäftigt, er kann sie keinen Augenblick lang wegnehmen.{/n} "Das darf nicht passieren!"
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's control altar,{/n} "This was not the plan, {name}! Stop!" {n}He tries to reach for his weapon, but his hands are full operating the intricate machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "This cannot happen!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar brüllt auf, versucht panisch an den Hebeln auf dem Betriebsaltar des Jochs zu ziehen:{/n} "Unser Plan war anders, {name}! Halt!" {n}Der Inquisitor versucht, nach seiner Waffe zu greifen, doch seine Hände sind mit der komplizierten Bedienung der Maschine beschäftigt, er kann sie keinen Augenblick lang wegnehmen.{/n} "Das wird nicht geschehen!"

languages.text: {n}カルカサルは咆哮し、ヨークの制御の祭壇のレバーを必死に引く。{/n}「これは予定外のことだ、{name}！止めろ！」{n}異端審問官は武器に手を伸ばそうとするが、彼の両手は複雑な機械の制御でいっぱいで、それすらも許されない。{/n}「そうはさせるものか！」
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's control altar,{/n} "This was not the plan, {name}! Stop!" {n}He tries to reach for his weapon, but his hands are full operating the intricate machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "This cannot happen!"

traits.locale_text: {n}カルカサルは咆哮し、ヨークの制御の祭壇のレバーを必死に引く。{/n}「これは予定外のことだ、{name}！止めろ！」{n}異端審問官は武器に手を伸ばそうとするが、彼の両手は複雑な機械の制御でいっぱいで、それすらも許されない。{/n}「そうはさせるものか！」

languages.text: {n}Calcazar, kükreyerek Boyunduruk'un kontrol sunağındaki kolları çılgınca çekiyor.{/n} "Plan böyle değildi {name}! Dur!" {n}Silahına uzanmaya çalışıyor ama elleri, hassas makinenin kontrolüyle meşgul olduğu için yapamıyor.{/n} "Olamaz!"
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's control altar,{/n} "This was not the plan, {name}! Stop!" {n}He tries to reach for his weapon, but his hands are full operating the intricate machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "This cannot happen!"
